description.value: Primary Energy: Fire 3 (cone of flames, damage) Supporting Energy: Space 1 (self, 15ft cone affecting 2 targets) Total Cost: 4 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Fire Potential + Fire Mastery + Space Potential + Space Mastery (4d8) Effect: A cone of flames shoots from your hands. All creatures in a 15-foot cone take [[/damage 16 type=fire]] damage. Each target takes the full listed damage and makes their own save. Saving Throw: Reflex (to reduce damage) Damage Type: Fire (energy) DR Interaction: Half DR ([[/damage 16 type=fire]] damage vs DR 4 becomes 16 - 2 = [[/damage 14]] damage) Success Scaling (Net successes = Your successes - Their successes): 0 = no damage, 1 = half damage (8), 2 = full damage (16), 3 = +[[/damage 8]] damage (24 total), 4 = +[[/damage 16]] damage (32 total) Ignited Condition (at Net 4): Target takes [[/damage 1d8 type=fire]] damage at the start of each of their turns. Target can use 1 action to make a [[/save type=reflex]] (1 success ends condition) or an ally can use 1 action to extinguish the flames.
